Name: Prints of Plateaus
Description: You meet an old lady in the Asphodel Barrens. She gazes at the fleeting frequencies off into the distance in search of a lost companion who can never return...
QuestDesc: You meet an old lady in the Asphodel Barrens. She gazes at the fleeting frequencies off into the distance in search of a lost companion who can never return...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're here again, Acis...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's been so long… and still, you can't let go?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's been so long, Acis. And your "spirit" still lingers here on these Plateaus.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. His "spirit" has been wandering here for ages. People have spotted it many times.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They called him "Timid Acis."

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The name came from his past.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Acis was once a well-known Gladiator... not for his courage, but for the opposite.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rumors painted him as a coward.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: An amateur who became a Gladiator. No talent. No strength.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Someone like him didn't fit in with the elites during the hunt on the Plateaus. And so, he started keeping his distance from the others.

Options.PlotLineKey: Why did he choose to be a Gladiator at all?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is. Misery followed Acis all the way to the end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No one really knew. Or maybe no one cared enough to ask.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All we know is that he died fighting the Dark Tide creatures, 52 years ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If his spirit hadn't lingered, no one would've remembered his story. He'd be just another nameless Gladiator buried in the Vale of Glory.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then why does his spirit still appear on the Plateaus?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It likely has something to do with the Sanguis Plateaus itself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard its unique terrain attracts and holds Remnant Energy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a result, many Gladiators who died here with unfulfilled wishes have left behind wandering frequencies.

Options.PlotLineKey: So Acis had an unfulfilled wish too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's what I've always wondered. I've asked people to look into it, but no one has ever found a clear answer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm not young anymore… but Acis is still out there, forever trapped in a tragedy from half a century ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=Young man;Female=Young lady}, could you track his traces and take photos of the places he's been to?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I want to know where he wandered… and what's still holding him here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, kind stranger. I'll make sure there's a reward for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course. I'll have it ready next time we meet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Also, please take this map. Acis marked it himself during the hunt. It shows the places he once visited. Follow it, and you'll know where to go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm counting on you, {Male=young man;Female=young lady}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm so sorry. Acis and I only found your weapons...

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll bring them back to the Vale of Glory, Ma, Pa. It's the only thing I can do for you now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Sorry, Misha. If only I were as strong as the Gladiators… If only I could've joined the hunt myself… Maybe then, your parents wouldn't have been taken by the Dark Tide...

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm still too weak. All I can do is watch over you from afar. But I promise that one day, I'll be strong enough.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (A new mark just showed up on the map... Guess I'd better check it out.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The map has just been updated with more details. Looks like I'm getting closer to the truth.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Time to follow it and investigate further.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've really been pushing yourself too hard lately, Acis.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ever since you became a Gladiator, you've come home covered in bruises every single day. Look at the spot I patched up last time… You've hurt it again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Sorry for making you worry.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's High Tide now, and I heard the Dark Tide creatures are no easy prey. Even regular Tacet Discords have gone feral under the Blightcloud… Is everyone on the hunting ground alright?

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't know all the details. But try to stay in camp if you can, Misha.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry about me. I'll protect you and our home.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe. Since when did my man learn to sound so cool, eh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's really all I want. Ever since I met you, I've known what I need to fight for.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mmhmm. And now you're learning how to make your lady blush too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: D-don't tease me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, alright. Off you go, Acis. I'll take care of myself and the little one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Guid_SYZY_7_1

Dialogues.Speaker: Accompanying Gladiator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was surprised to hear Misha let you join the hunt this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …She didn't. I didn't tell her. If she finds out, a scolding won't be the end of it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Accompanying Gladiator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You... Well, if that's your choice, I won't say more about it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Accompanying Gladiator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But aren't you afraid, Acis? Our mission this time is to hunt the Dark Tide creatures in the lower levels, the most dangerous place of the Plateaus. We also need to record the Dark Tide's data. One mistake, and we're gone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course I'm scared. To be honest, my legs are still shaking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But even so, I have to face it. I made a vow to protect Misha here in this canyon. It's time I live up to that promise.

Dialogues.Speaker: Accompanying Gladiator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, then I guess we can't call you "Timid Acis" anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Accompanying Gladiator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry for what I said before. There's still a bit of time before we head out. Go say a proper goodbye to Misha, Acis.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The hunt this time didn't go as planned. Those monsters destroyed the traps we set. They could break through the siege any moment now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The captain assigned me to the frontline team to go after the ones that escaped. Tomorrow morning, we're heading deep into Maroonwood to track them down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just promise you'll make it back safe and sound, okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see... Well then, take this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I made these necklaces. One for each of us. Keep it with you, as a talisman. Promise?

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Okay.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Cheer up now. I'll be waiting for you at the foot of the Three Heroes' Crest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Three Heroes' Crest… where we made our vow?

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly. That's why it matters. So promise me… you'll come back safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You find a necklace just like the one from the memory left by the frequency. It resonates with your map and reveals a new marker.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Is this... Misha's necklace? Did she leave it here as a prayer for Acis's safe return?)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The marked route just ends here.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Maybe the Sensor can find more clues.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Accompanying Gladiator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Sorry, Acis, for leaving you to face this mission alone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't give up, Captain! The other teams—they're coming, they'll be here soon…

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just hold on… Captain?

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please… don't leave me alone…

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even if I'm the last one standing, I'll track those monsters… and record every trace… for the Ephor…

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Damn it… why won't this bleeding stop…

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Didn't spot the necklace mentioned in the letter... Could it be lost nearby?)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should search around for hidden clues.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Misha's necklace is glowing… and the light's pointing at that Drake nearby.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (…Is that Acis's necklace in its claw?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You defeat the Drake and recover Acis's lost necklace, clutched tightly in its claws.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Following Acis's wish, you join his necklace with Misha's and place them together in the last place marked on the map.
You've kept me waiting so long, Acis.

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mi… Misha?

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, don't cry, my love. Aren't you happy to see me now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am…

Dialogues.Speaker: Acis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm back, Misha.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome home, Acis.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome back, young one. I've been waiting for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How did the investigation I requested go?

Options.PlotLineKey: (You hand over the necklaces and photos to Ina.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You show her the photos you took and tell her how Acis's story came to an end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So Father's frequency lingered all these years… just to fulfill his promise to Mother.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm so sorry, Father, for making you wander alone for so long.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. I'm their daughter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fifty-two years ago, the observation data my father protected was eventually found by Ephor Valeria and her team. Thanks to that, both the town and the city of Septimont were spared from disaster.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Father wasn't so lucky. He and his entire squad were lost to the hunting grounds that night.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It wasn't until eight years ago that his frequency started appearing around the Sanguis Plateaus again. That's when people began to remember the name “Timid Acis.”

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But by then, my mother was already old and losing her memory. Before she forgot everything, the one thing she asked of me… was to uncover the truth about my father.

Options.PlotLineKey: Your mother... I think I saw her just now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then what you saw must have been her lingering frequency after passing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She forgot so much… but never the one she loved.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should be going. My grandson's still waiting for me at home.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He's always wanted to be a Gladiator like his father. No matter who tries to talk him out of it… he won't budge. Ha, I wonder where he got that stubbornness from.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I only wish Mother and Father could have seen all this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Yeah. You're right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well then, I should take my leave too. Thank you, young one. Thank you… for giving this story its ending.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A new frequency appeared. That figure... Is that Misha?
